title: Human and ecological risk assessments of potentially toxic elements in sediments around a pharmaceutical industry
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Hussein K. Okoro, Muyiwa M. Orosun, Salman A. Umar, Khursheed Muzammil, Clement O. Ogunkunle, Kingsley O. Iwuozor, Ebuka Chizitere Emenike, Saiful Islam, Jane C. Ngila, Caliphs Zvinowanda
